title: Is Facebook Spying On You With The FBI? (Ep 1852)
description:
In this episode, I address the breaking story that Facebook may have been coordinating with the FBI to target conservatives. 

News Picks:

New allegations surface about Facebook collaborating with the FBI to spy on Americans. 

Biden to host White House summit to combat racism, violent extremism.


A tentative deal appears to have been reached over the threatened rail and port strike. 

Why Hispanics are leaving the Democrat Party. 


What we learned from the newly released, less redacted Trump raid affidavit.

Why a ‘Digital Dollar' Is a Really Bad Idea.

Emmy Awards Viewership Falls To New All-Time Low.
